content:
Curious for a quick implementer survey: are people using Search in Messaging? I am working through updates to the search page and have noticed... issues? with the definition in Messaging and was wondering if it has been exercised.
Thanks!
I'm not aware of any implementations. What's the gist of what'd need to be changed ?

From a quick pass, I ended up filing two tickets: FHIR-36098 and FHIR-36116 .

The short version of the first ticket is that the way mapping is defined from search parameters into typed Parameter key-value pairs prohibits prefixes (e.g., < 2.0), and a few other items of that type (e.g., modifiers aren't described as allowed or not, etc.).

The short version of the second ticket is that it specifies a resourceType key, while the search page (normative) describes a parameter _type for the same purpose.

I thought it would be better to ask about implementations here before I looked any further, but I am working on Search Page tickets and stumbled across it (discussing different protocols for search).
